publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1020.3 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Pensioner Poverty—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1020) in the name of John Swinburne, insert at end "and congratulates the Scottish Executive for closing the opportunity gap for Scotland’s poorest pensioners; welcomes Executive policies that are helping pensioners to save money on heating their homes effectively, providing assistance with bus fares and continuing free personal and nursing care, and supports the Executive in encouraging pensioners to claim benefits that are rightfully theirs, such as council tax benefit, through the central heating programme, and through disseminating information to local authorities and old people’s organisations." Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
